On Thu, Aug 06, 1998, Torsten Naumann wrote:

> I tried out the new wml version 1.6.7. I have problems with this.
> Please try this wml example:
> -----------------------------------------------------------------
> #use wml::std::logo
> <logo name="wml">
> -----------------------------------------------------------------
>[...]
>     my $target = ""
>[...]
> 
> Perl misses the ";" after the my $target = "" . 

Ops, that's a bug. Fixed for WML 1.6.8. Thanks for the hint, Torsten.
WML 1.6.8 will be released the next days after I've also looked at
the wml::std::grid issues...
